ofx:section.ofx:title: Duration
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: To perform each test case requires a certain amount of time for each individual tester. In the detailed definition of test cases a estimated duration is included. This estimation includes:

l:item.ofx:paragraph: Reading the relevant section in the handbook.
Reading the detailed description of the test case.
Interpreting the test result and documenting the result in the QA portal.
